Primary Contact: Richard and Sue Morris, Site Leaders
Service Details: - Offers sensory-based treatment model in a supportive, confidential and non-judgmental environment where women and men can express, release and reconcile painful post-abortive emotions to begin the process of restoration, renewal and healing- Offers group weekend retreats and one-on-one counselling
Dates: - Retreats are scheduled twice per year, spring and fall in Kelowna- Next retreat take place: October 12-14, 2018
Eligibility: Individuals under 18 years of age require a parent's written consent
